side-effects.side-effect: ProTo Typ 0815 may cause mild headaches.
Do not take ProTo Type 0815 at the same time as antibiotics! May cause life-threatening nausea.

application.p: Take 30 ml of ProTo Typ 0815 twice daily orally.
Children and adolescents under 12 years of age should take a maximum of 15 ml once a day.
Contact your doctor or pharmacist for further information.
